mapper.select: select m.*, d.deptname, p.posname from member m, department d, position p where m.deptcode=d.deptcode and m.poscode=p.poscode
select * from department order by deptcode
mapper.insert: insert into address(adno, memno, name, hp1, hp2, hp3, email1, email2, adgno, company, deptname, posname, homeaddress, homepage, messenger, sns, memo) values(adno_seq.nextval, #{memNo}, #{name}, #{hp1}, #{hp2}, #{hp3}, #{email1}, #{email2}, #{adgNo}, #{company}, #{deptName}, #{posName}, #{homeAddress}, #{homePage}, #{messenger}, #{SNS}, #{memo})
